Work done: i grabbed the 1080p files from
TROUBLEMAKER they was pretty good so i
didn't do much to it.
i started with cutting it to pieces to
get the audio synced after that i
changed the levels a little bit played
a little bit with the colors changed the
brightness a little bit as i thought it
was a little bit to bright might have
gotten a little bit to dark but i like
i better now, added some sharpen to it
and resized it to the resolution i
think was right.
 
audio i did nothing to just synced 
it to the video, there is some noise in
the audio i could have tried to remove
but was to lazy :P
audio might still be oos a little bit but
yeah you can sync it like you want it
in your player.
 
Sample included
so yeah take it or leave it :)
